response.original_title: TDEOMMVDH: The Deplorable Existence of Monster Mt. vs Dreamo Hernandez
response.overview: A solo animation project by new coming artist Bradley Wilkinson. Hand drawn on flip books, Wilkinson animates, writes, edits, and also composes his own indie score for this short. It is a stoner surreal lo-brow art film with A.D.D. There is a variety of characters with small juxtaposed sub-stories. An art project turned into a story to help him deal with his brother's death.
response.title: TDEOMMVDH: The Deplorable Existence of Monster Mt. vs Dreamo Hernandez
